snippet: A deal on oil pipeline fees is a good step and should be implemented quickly, but the countries face many other volatile issues.
abstract: Editorial urges Sudan and South Sudan to carry out the deal on oil pipeline fees as quickly as possible, so both sides can shift their focus to more fundamental challenges such as improving governance, ending human rights violations and eradicating corruption.
lead_paragraph: A deal on oil pipeline fees is a good step and should be implemented quickly, but the countries face many other volatile issues.

headline.seo: Sudan and South Sudan Make Progress
headline.main: Sudan and South Sudan Make Progress
headline.print_headline: Sudan and South Sudan Make Progress
